schema.description: A game is a release-agnostic pinball table.

_created_by.description: Reference to the user who created this game. Only visible by contributors and above.

_id.description: Unique identifier for a game. Must be set at creation and becomes read-only after that. Typically the most common abbreviation of a game is used, e.g. `afm` for *Attack From Mars*.

backglass.description: Reference to an uploaded backglass image.

artists.description: A list of people who provided artwork for the game.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the game was added to the database.

description.description: A short description of the game. Will be Markdown formatted.

designers.description: A list of people who designed the gameplay.

game_type.description:
How the game is built. The following are valid values:
 * `ss` - Solid state game
 * `em` - Electro-mechanical game
 * `pm` - Pure mechanical game
 * `og` - Original game
 * `na` - Not available (unknown)

instructions.description: Instructions how to play the game. Will be Markdown formatted.

rating.description: Rating at the time the games was added to the database.

manufacturer.description: Name of the game manufacturer. For *original games*, put the author name or alias.

model_number.description: The model number of this game given by the manufacturer.

notes.description: Any special notes about the game.

produced_units.description: How my units of this game were manufactured.

short.description: A list of common abbreviations for the game.

slogans.description: Slogans used when advertising the game.

themes.description: A list of themes related to the game.

title.description: The full title of the game.

toys.description: Toys that are on the playfield of the game.

year.description: The year in which the games was released.

schema.title: Game

data.description: A short description of the game.
data.instructions: Instructions how to play the game.
data.notes: Any special notes about the game.
data.slogans: Slogans used when advertising the game.

data.toys: Toys that are on the playfield of the game.

     'type': 'string'}

tests.python_error:
'Afm' does not match '^[a-z0-9-]{2,}$'

Failed validating 'pattern' in schema['properties']['_id']:
    {'description': 'Unique identifier for a game. Must be set at creation '
                    'and becomes read-only after that. Typically the most '
                    'common abbreviation of a game is used, e.g. `afm` for '
                    '*Attack From Mars*.',
     'pattern': '^[a-z0-9-]{2,}$',
     'type': 'string',
     'writeOnce': True}

On instance['_id']:
    'Afm'
